lines: 1. Swa Nandziha Ku Khongela, Ndzi Tshinela Ka Tatana, Swi Ndzi Tisa Ka Tatana,
Ku Vula Xiyimo Xanga; Hinkarhi Wo Xaniseka, Ndzi Kuma Wo Nchavelelo,
Ndzi Hlula Ndzingo Wa Nala, Hi Nkarhi Wa Ku Khongela.
2. Swa Nandziha Ku Khongela. Ndzi Fikisa Swikombelo,
Ka Yena La Tshembekeke, Wo Rhandza Ku Katekisa; Yesu U Ndzi Vitanile, Ku Pfumela Rito Rakwe,
Ndzi Ta Rhula Ndzhwalo Wanga, Hi Nkarhi Wa Ku Khongela.
3. Swa Nandziha Ku Khognela, I Nkarhi Wo Tiyisiwa,
Sweswi Ndza Ri Vona Kaya, Ndzi Ta Tlhandlukela Kona; Hi Miri Wu Nga Boriki, Ndzi Ta Amukela Harhi, Ndzi Huwelela Mpfhukeni, Sala Kahle Xikhongelo.
